biography: Matti, a golfer of considerable repute, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While his home club remains a topic of speculation among enthusiasts, his dedication to golf is unquestionable.

In past Hector Trophée events, Matti has participated twice, demonstrating a commitment to the tournament. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his presence on the course is always anticipated with keen interest.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, Matti will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, in the unpredictable world of golf, last-minute changes are not uncommon, leaving room for speculation about a possible return.
